Yes, please. This poly/spandex knit top is every bit as soft as chenille but more durable for everyday wear. The textured pattern, cowl neckline, and three-button front makes it eye-catching. Long sleeve, High-Low hem. Machine wash. Imported. S (4-6), M (8-10), L (12-14), XL (16), 1X (18), 2X (18W-20W), 3X (22W)
